data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Patillas, Puerto Rico that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Patillas, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Patillas, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Patillas prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 5,300 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Patillas.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Patillas
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Patillas, Patillas, Puerto Rico.
Lord, there are 10,112 people in the state of Patillas who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Patillas, Puerto Rico that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Patillas, Puerto Rico that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ
